name: Bionic Tadpole (SaGa76)
description:
Busted free from The Lab's control, he's on the run... Bionic Tadpole! Every bullet has Bionic Tadpole's name on it as he escapes R-Man City in the stolen bionic suit!
Run-n-Gun, beat the timer, pick up weapons, use your force shield and jetpack abilities...and always remember to never let your gun overheat.
Elements of fun platforming, bullet-hell and twin stick-controlled action!
 Original music by MaximusCXI, created for each Stage. *Xbox Controller strongly recommended* (although mouse and keyboard compatible)

*Hint* 

Aim gun at the ground, fire weapon and jump to perform a high jump.
